description: Kaulonia is an Achaean colony of Magna Graecia founded in the eighth or seventh century BC.
details: The Barrington Atlas Directory notes: Monasterace Marina

properties.title: OSM location of archaeological area of Kaulonia

add ToposText reference provided by bkiesling
